TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Constants extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Creates a UI element that allows user invocation of ASP.NET event handlers and provides a way to post user input from UI elements back to the server.

span.span: Creates a UI element that allows user invocation of ASP.NET event handlers and provides a way to post user input from UI elements back to the server.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的唯讀類別的成員，您可以使用。The following table describes the read-only class members you can use. |成員Member|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |AlternatingItemTemplateTagAlternatingItemTemplateTag|包含 AlternatingItem 範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the AlternatingItem template.| |ContentTemplateTagContentTemplateTag|包含標籤名稱內容的範本。Contains the tag name for the Content template.| |DefaultSessionsStateHistorySizeDefaultSessionsStateHistorySize|包含預設的記錄堆疊的深度。Contains the default depth of the history stack.| |EventArgumentIDEventArgumentID|回傳事件相關聯的引數。The argument associated with the postback event.| |EventSourceIDEventSourceID|包含事件目標 （產生回傳的控制項） 的查詢字串名稱。Contains the query String name of the event target (the control that generated the postback).| |FooterTemplateTagFooterTemplateTag|包含頁尾樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Footer template.| |FormIDPrefixFormIDPrefix|包含在 URL 中表單的前置詞。Contains the prefix of a form in a URL.| |HeaderTemplateTagHeaderTemplateTag|包含 HeaderTemplate 的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the HeaderTemplate.| |ItemDetailsTemplateTagItemDetailsTemplateTag|包含 ItemDetails 範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the ItemDetails template.| |ItemTemplateTagItemTemplateTag|包含項目範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Item template.| |LabelTemplateTagLabelTemplateTag|包含標籤範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Label template.| |OptimumPageWeightParameterOptimumPageWeightParameter|包含預設頁面加權。Contains the default page weight.| |PagePrefixPagePrefix|包含用來確保正確的頁碼編排中回傳的頁面數字的分隔符號。Contains a page number delimiter used to ensure proper page numbering in a postback.| |ScreenCharactersHeightParameterScreenCharactersHeightParameter|包含預設的字元在螢幕上的高度。Contains the default for the height of the characters on the screen.| |ScriptTemplateTagScriptTemplateTag|包含指令碼範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Script template.| |SelectionListSpecialCharacterSelectionListSpecialCharacter|包含用於 cHTML 核取方塊 Id 中的字元。Contains the character used in CheckBox IDs for cHTML.| |SeparatorTemplateTagSeparatorTemplateTag|包含分隔符號樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Separator template.| |SymbolProtocolSymbolProtocol|包含用來代表 i 模式或 J-phone 符號配置的開頭的字元。Contains the characters used to denote the beginning of an i-mode or J-Phone symbol scheme.| |UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableUniqueFilePathSuffixVariable|包含唯一的檔案路徑後置詞的查詢字串名稱。Contains the query String name of the unique file path suffix.| |UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqualUniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqual|包含唯一的檔案路徑後置詞，但沒有等號查詢字串名稱。Contains the query String name of the unique file path suffix, but no equal sign.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks AlternatingItemTemplateTagAlternatingItemTemplateTag 包含 AlternatingItem 範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the AlternatingItem template. ContentTemplateTagContentTemplateTag 包含標籤名稱內容的範本。Contains the tag name for the Content template. DefaultSessionsStateHistorySizeDefaultSessionsStateHistorySize 包含預設 SessionsState 記錄大小。Contains the default SessionsState history size. EventArgumentIDEventArgumentID 包含事件引數識別碼。Contains the Event Argument ID. EventSourceIDEventSourceID 包含事件的來源識別碼。Contains the Event Source ID. FooterTemplateTagFooterTemplateTag 包含頁尾樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Footer template. FormIDPrefixFormIDPrefix 包含表單識別碼前置詞。Contains the Form ID prefix. HeaderTemplateTagHeaderTemplateTag 包含標頭範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Header template. ItemDetailsTemplateTagItemDetailsTemplateTag 包含 ItemDetails 範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the ItemDetails template. ItemTemplateTagItemTemplateTag 包含項目範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Item template. LabelTemplateTagLabelTemplateTag 包含標籤範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Label template. OptimumPageWeightParameterOptimumPageWeightParameter 包含最佳頁面權重參數。Contains the optimum page weight parameter. PagePrefixPagePrefix 包含頁面的前置詞。Contains the page prefix. ScreenCharactersHeightParameterScreenCharactersHeightParameter 包含螢幕字元高度參數。Contains the screen characters height parameter. ScriptTemplateTagScriptTemplateTag 包含指令碼範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Script template. SelectionListSpecialCharacterSelectionListSpecialCharacter 包含選取項目清單的特殊字元。Contains the selection list special character. SeparatorTemplateTagSeparatorTemplateTag 包含分隔符號樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Separator template. SymbolProtocolSymbolProtocol 包含符號通訊協定。Contains the symbol protocol. UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableUniqueFilePathSuffixVariable 包含唯一的檔案路徑後置詞的變數。Contains the unique file path suffix variable. UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqualUniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqual 包含唯一的檔案路徑後置詞的變數不含等號。Contains the unique file path suffix variable without equal.
